plot: Jeremy tests the Volkswagen Golf GTI W12 concept car. Jeremy, Richard and James take a road trip to find the greatest driving road in the World. Dame Helen Mirren is the Star In A Reasonably Priced Car.

Jeremy, Richard and James take a Lamborghini Gallardo Superleggera, a Porsche 911 GT3 RS and an Aston Martin V8 Vantage N24 to mainland Europe in search of the world's best driving road. Jeremy drives the Volkswagen Golf GTi W12 concept car. Dame Helen Mirren is the Star In A Reasonably Priced Car, and she explains the concept of public transport.—Allister Coots

Jeremy tests a new Golf prototype. The VW Golf W12-650. The boys are on a quest to find the Greatest Driving Road in three lightweight super cars, the Porsche 911 GT3 RS, the Lamborghini Gallardo Superleggera and the Aston Martin V8 Vantage N24.—snake6790
